ComicInfo.Title: A Zero Zero Story; The Turning Point; Teddy; Suffering for The Stones; Zoo of Madness; A Brief Encounter With a Strange Troll; Frankenstein, My Love; Pussied Out; Alfred the Great; The Search for Smilin' Ed, part seven
ComicInfo.Summary:
A Zero Zero Story: David injures a finger on his drawing hand, and frets about contributing to Zero Zero.
The Turning Point: How the Eunuch survived the crocodiles
Teddy: Teddy relives elements of his life.
Suffering for The Stones: Joe Sacco's experiences listening to the Stones as they are about to play in Portland.
Zoo of Madness: The District Attorney of 1000 Faces has become obsessive/compulsive.
A Brief Encounter With a Strange Troll: Frank sees twin sisters arguing.
Frankenstein, My Love: Nora lacks love, so she steals the feelings of others.
Pussied Out: A philanderer has a choice to make.
Alfred the Great: A biography of Alfred the Great and his singular talent.
The Search for Smilin' Ed, part seven: Kim Deitch has an odd dream and scripted comic pages appear in his in-box.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-23 22:39:57. [CVDB240533] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 22:56:03. [Issue ID 359384]
